OrgName: LexisNexis Risk Solutions, operating through LexisNexis Risk Holdings Inc. and LexisNexis Risk Data Management Inc. and their subsidiaries
activities: LexisNexis Risk Solutions, operating through LexisNexis Risk Holdings Inc. and LexisNexis Risk Data Management Inc. and their subsidiaries will be accessing or receiving personal information from the EU and Switzerland in the course of doing business.  Those business activities primarily relate to providing data analytics that allow businesses and other entities to manage risks in areas such as financial services, insurance, fraud prevention, and law enforcement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We adhere to AICPA Generally Accepted Privacy Principles and we also have a self-regulatory privacy program in place that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
